SELECT c.id, c.user_id, p.ID , m.id, p.NAME, p.ORIGIN_PRICE FROM alz_user m, alz_merchandise_detail p, alz_cart c WHERE m.id = c.user_id AND p.id = c.merchandise_id AND c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.id
SELECT NVL (sum(ORIGIN_PRICE), 0) money FROM alz_cart c, alz_merchandise_detail p WHERE c.merchandise_id = p.id AND c.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT c.id, c.user_id, p.ID , m.id, p.NAME, p.ORIGIN_PRICE FROM alz_user m, alz_merchandise_detail p, alz_cart c WHERE m.id = c.user_id AND p.id = c.merchandise_id AND c.id = #{id} ORDER BY c.id

SELECT alz_cart.id, alz_cart.user_id, alz_merchandise_detail.ID, alz_merchandise_detail.NAME, alz_merchandise_detail.ORIGIN_PRICE FROM alz_cart INNER JOIN alz_merchandise_detail ON alz_cart.merchandise_id = alz_merchandise_detail.id WHERE alz_merchandise_detail.id = #{merchandiseId} and alz_cart.user_id = #{userId}
